intentName.description: Stable name of the intent (e.g. summarizeDocument).

version.description: Semantic version of the intent definition (e.g. 1.0).

description.description: Human-readable description of what this intent does.

input.description: JSON Schema describing the expected input payload.

output.description: JSON Schema describing the expected output payload.

metadata.description: Arbitrary metadata about the intent (category, tags, etc.).
